title: I MADE IT OUTA BRONZE
body:
I DID IT
I CLIMBED OUT
WOOOOOHOOOOOOOOOO

replies.body: Congrats {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Congrats! Just in time as well

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XRYu5Nke,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-01-18T23:33:17.239+0000)
>
> Congrats! Just in time as well

Just in time for what? To get soft reset, win 7/10 games but get placed back to bronze?
Yeah Ranked reset is tonight so he got Silver just before the Ranked Reset!
Maruader can you please confirm a time sir?

January 20th at 00:00 AEDT (midnight) :)
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2016-ranked-season-kicks-soon
thanks, gl for placements ;)
After winning 6 and losing 4 this summoner is now Bronze 4, well played riot.
Good job man! keep it up! :)
Congrats! Hit us up when you hit chal and we'll give you a run! ;)

G'day Frank,

As an ADC main I feel getting into chiefs may be difficult, do you think I should change to a top main before hitting challenjour so as to have a better shot of making the Chiefs line-up?
Sorry for the late reply but we're always on the lookout for good talent, but it'll be tough to top any of my boys!

> [{quoted}](name=kfitz45,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XRYu5Nke,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-18T11:17:31.825+0000)
>
> I DID IT
> I CLIMBED OUT
> WOOOOOHOOOOOOOOOO

And now you're bronze 4
Won 6/10 placements.....rito why u do dis
Nice work! Sweet timing! Make sure you don't fall back down again hahah!
Gratz man i am one win away from being silver myself!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}  ayy good luck in silver boi {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Hey great job man. Keep in mind, you're going to need to work double as hard too keep improving from here. Keep at it and you'll make gold. 

Just remember that, it's not advanced mechanics and big plays that's holding you back form Gold +. It's basic decision making and mechanics (CSing, landing skillshots etc). 

It's bit of trap some players fall into when they reach Silver, and think they need to master Lee Sin insec and godlike mechanics to win games.
I was bronze 3 but I climbed out, am now silver 3. Mechanics just plays a small part of winning games but playing smart and game knowledge is what wins it.
May be back to Bronze again once new season resets so don't be too upset!
same here bro {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Ding gratz
Grats man!
out of the frying pan, into the fire... congratz
gj, now get through hell level 2, silver, difficulty medium<hell
silver is worse tbh
Congratulations!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
